name: Synthetic Soul
description:
Synthetic Soul is an immersive modern Rags to Riches life sim with an in-depth robot companion.

This idea allows you to play the game your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After a Greydoll robot is sent to your front door without you buying it, you start to climb the social ladder.

Climbing the social ladder means having new outfits and personality modules for your robot and buying better homes.

Earn money via working a job or doing day stock trading, all while being able to sleep with co-workers.

What kind of person will you become once you truly have it all?

Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.
